verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's] decision to [V: go] [ARG2: forward] [ARG1: with tariffs on $ 50 billion worth of Chinese goods] will ultimately drive up costs for US consumers and hurt the global economy according to trade experts .

President Donald Trump 's decision to go forward with tariffs on $ 50 billion worth of Chinese goods [V: will] ultimately drive up costs for US consumers and hurt the global economy according to trade experts .
